text:
Question 140) The glass top of a table has broken and should be replaced by another that has the form of a circle. The table support support is shaped like a straight, base -shaped triangle -shaped prism with sides measuring 30 cm.
One store sells five types of circular glass tops with standard cuts, whose rays measure 18 cm, 26 cm, 30 cm, 35 cm and 60 cm. The table owner wants to purchase in this store the smaller diameter top that is sufficient to cover the top base of the table support.
Consider 1.7 as approach to âˆš3.
The top to be chosen will be the one whose radius, in centimeters, is equal to
A) 18.
B) 26.
C) 30.
D) 35.
E) 60.
